body: yeah, you're right. The reason I use `dim_list_to_bitset` is to avoid duplicate dims: `dims = [0, 0]`, and I really want this check. Please correct me if you think it is not needed. Maybe I should introduce another one similar to `dim_list_to_bitset` without returning bitset since I might not need it.
